select woi.orderId,woi.total_money as totalMoney,woi.creat_time as creatTime,woi.evaluate,woi.thasfp, woi.subject, woi.status, woi.openId,woi.email,woi.team,woi.title, woi.art_type as artType ,woi.user_upload_status as userUploadStatus,woi.teacher_upload_status as teacherUploadStatus,wr.nickName,wr.role,wl.nickName superName from w_order_info woi left join w_role wr on wr.openId = woi.openId left join w_role wl on wl.team = woi.team and wl.role = 4
where order_pool = 1
